posts.post_content:
For sale today are four Cobbs, prices include shipping.  References are available upon request as are additional scans.  An "Ill take it" trumps any ongoing negotiations and I would be willing to work on price a touch for multiples bought.  Please feel free to send any questions my way and thanks for looking.

PSA 4 Green SOLD
SGC 2 Green $4,000
PSA 2.5 Red  SOLD
SGC 2.5 Red SOLD

Just updating things after a long day at work.

Both Greens available, open to offers.
Price drop, do both for $13,250.  Not looking for trades at this time unless its a tough Cobb piece.
One last card, need to sell.  Priced at what some 1s are selling for, solid card with the typical o/c.  Not looking for trades at this time except a tough item if you have one, thanks.
I am glad you sold that green Cobb 4 - it is pretty. Whoever picked that up got a great card and a very fair price. Congrats.
